output_list.reason: The mint function does not check for overflow, allowing the total supply to be set to any arbitrary value.
The migrate function does not check for overflow, allowing users to migrate any arbitrary amount of tokens to the migration agent.
The mint function allows anyone to mint tokens, granting the minter the ability to arbitrarily create new tokens.
The setMigrationAgent function allows anyone to set a migration agent, granting the caller the ability to control token migration.
The setMigrationMaster function allows anyone to set a new migration master, granting the caller the ability to control token migration.
